sites.name: Strawberry Micro-Projects
sites.description: Playful strawberry-themed micro-project collection. Features: /tools (indie tech spotlight), /canvas (infinite canvas), /breathe (relaxation), /dvd (bouncing emojis), /wikipedia (random articles), /swearjar, /confetti, /reaction (reflex test). Philosophy: 'simple projects that drive growth'

sites.name: Virpy's InfoSec Portfolio
sites.description: Personal portfolio for infosec analyst interested in reverse engineering, malware analysis, and security auditing. Building @joinbrag and @usefenced projects.

sites.name: Madmeg's Technical Blog
sites.description: Technical blog covering engineering best practices, low-level programming languages, mathematical problem-solving (Advent of Code with formulas), geometry enthusiasm. Includes collaborative circle-drawing tool.

sites.name: SwagZo Terminal
sites.description: Terminal-style personal page with links to GitHub, Twitter (X), Lidraughts, Monkeytype, and Discord. Minimalist aesthetic with command-line interface design.

sites.name: BohemianHacks
sites.description: GitHub portfolio: 'Practical Engineering for Impractical Ideas'. 70 repositories including swarm intelligence (ESP32/TensorFlow), PodGet (podcast grabber), programming coursework. Collaborative cryptocurrency projects.

sites.name: Shunya Research Lab
sites.description: Student-led research lab. Cognita: Transformer-alternate AI architectures using bio-mimicry. Mantis: EEG-based brain-computer interfaces for cybernetic prosthetics, ADHD applications, affordable BCI for Indian market.

sites.name: Matthew's Dev Portfolio
sites.description: Junior web developer in Philippines. Projects: Mailify (YouTube extension), Seiyuufind (voice actor search), Romanilyzer. Tech stack: HTML/CSS/JS, learning React/Node/MongoDB/Python.

sites.name: Resorcinol's Portfolio
sites.description: Minimal portfolio for Ayush Raghuvanshi, pre-final year CS student. Specializes in algorithm thinking and backend development.

sites.name: Kevin Roosey Portfolio
sites.description: Design-focused frontend engineer specializing in AI-native interfaces (artifacts, streaming UI, tools). Loves running and cycling for exploration. Open to full-time in-person roles in SF/NYC/Chicago/Seattle.

sites.name: Kreyon's Projects
sites.description: 3rd year BCA student, fullstack developer. Projects: RAG-based CLI for PDF chat, Zomato clone, Discord bot, 100xDevs Rich Presence, meme social platform, AI cover letter generator, Tic Tac Toe, passport photo checker, Eatopia app.

sites.name: Shashank Verma Portfolio
sites.description: CSE grad, systems programmer. Experience: SDE at Konrad Group, Full Stack at SuperAlign, Security at Expedia. Languages: C, C++, Go, Rust, Swift, Java, Kotlin. AOSP maintainer. Projects: XOR Cryptor, StatsBar, Claw Vault, MotiClubs, Rubik's Cube Solver.

sites.name: Priyav's Project Showcase
sites.description: Massive project showcase: ātmán (neural network mimicking brain), Conway's Game of Life, password manager, song analysis, location chat, SuperAlign.ai startup, campus RPG, GitHub analyzer, COVID RPG, collaborative paint, disaster donations platform, Game automation, 20-20-20 reminder, CTF challenges, Rust/WASM implementations.

sites.name: Compiled Thoughts iOS
sites.description: iOS app portfolio. Featured: 'App of the Dead: Afterlife' - gamified learning about world religions' afterlife beliefs using local MLX LLM technology, offline AI, XP/achievements system.

sites.name: Daelon's Technical Blog
